title: Thank you riot
body: I have been playing league for 2 years now. IT is one of the best and most addictive games I have ever touched. IT has created many emotional and mental challenges for me to over come. I just wanted to say that in this time, I have heard many things about riot and people constantly blaming riot or getting on their case for a variety of things. However I honestly would like to say, Thank You. You guys go above and beyond the call of duty for your players. I have seen you guys listen to your players and come to terms with us on many things to constantly increase our fun and interests. Ive also seen that as a company you guys come to us as players not as customers. Ive read stories where rioters go above and beyond to help individual players. So again, I would seriously like to say thank you guys. I feel like you honestly don't get enough praise for al the things you do.

replies.body: Now if only they would fix their horrid treatment of Soraka.

Please.
No.
No more of this.
It's not like we all weren't too busy playing Thresh and Blitz anyway...

For positive feedback like this, I thank you for your recognition, and I've learn what we should continue be doing. 
For negative feedback like what Naoki mentioned below, I thank you for that you cared about League, and I've learn what we should be making changes/improvements on. 

For those who are willing to provide any feedback at all, that means you CARE regardless whether the feedback is positive or negative. Imo, any feedback is better than "I don't care about League" or "I don't know about League". 

After all, only the ones that CARES are willing to give feedback. And I thank you for that.

This is the real reason League of Legends has succeeded in becoming  one of the best games around, regardless of the good things other MOBAs have to offer. Its the player-company relationship that makes all the difference.
For a second I thought you were making snide comments at Riot's IT team.
